I need to undergo a nucleic acid test. Where should I go?
Hello! Nucleic acid tests are conducted at the Fever Clinic, located to the left outside the main entrance of the hospital.

I want to make an appointment with the Gastroenterology Department. How can I do that?

Hello! Appointments can be made through the following ways: 1. Follow the official WeChat account 'Shenzhen Yantian District People's Hospital' or the 160APP; 2. Visit the Comprehensive Service Center on the first floor of the outpatient building or various specialty triage desks for on-site appointments; 3. Call 400-11-91160 for appointments; 4. Visit the website sz.91160.com for appointments. The Gastroenterology Department is on the seventh floor.

I want to know how to check my test reports.

Hello! You can view your test reports on the WeChat Mini Program. Follow the official account 'Shenzhen Yantian District People's Hospital,' select 'Smart Hospital,' then click on login, choose the patient, and click on report inquiry to view your test reports.

I need to print my medical records. Where should I go?

Hello! Outpatient medical records can be printed at the manual guidance counter on the first floor of the outpatient building. For inpatient records, you need to go to the medical records department on the 12th floor of the inpatient building. Please note that a copy of the patient's ID is required for printing medical records.

Hello! You can register or obtain a number through the self-service machines in the lobby on the first floor of the outpatient building. If you encounter difficulties, you can also register or obtain a number at the manual registration window.
